title: Uncle Smiley goes to the beach
creator_credit: GME Films, Learning Corporation of America, Joe Sutherin and Jim Burroughs
brief_description: Shows Uncle Smiley and his group playing where land and sea meet. Emphasises the possibilities for either use or misuse of public beaches. Uncle Smiley gets careless and needs to be rescued by a lifeguard and the children help to clean up a nearby polluted beach. Suitable for middle and upper primary level.
